00022 #ifndef __MR_KERN_LOGGING_H
00023 #define __MR_KERN_LOGGING_H
00024 
00025 // logging flags
00026 #define LOG_FLAG_ALL  0xffff
00027 #define LOG_FLAG_ALL_LEVELS 0x000f
00028 // bits 0 to 3 represent debug type flags
00029 #define LOG_ERROR      0x0001
00030 #define LOG_WARNING    0x0002
00031 #define LOG_INFO       0x0004
00032 #define LOG_DBG        0x0008
00033 
00034 // bits 4 to 15 represent log group flags, e.g. the read function is a logging group
00035 #define LOG_INTERNAL   0x0010 // internal stuff
00036 #define LOG_LLSEEK     0x0020 // seek
00037 #define LOG_READ_WRITE 0x0040 // read/write
00038 #define LOG_IOCTL      0x0080 // ioctl messages
00039 #define LOG_MMAP       0x0100 // everthing concerning mmap
00040 #define LOG_OPEN_CLOSE 0x0200 // open/ close procedures
00041 #define LOG_FPGA_CONF  0x0400 // fpga configuration through separate driver mode
00042 #define LOG_DRIVER_LCK 0x0800 // locking of the driver
00043 #define LOG_SELFTEST   0x1000 // selftest at module load
00044 
00045 #ifdef NODEBUG
00046 // for now there are no messages in the release version
00047 // error and warning should be enabled later
00048 // just empty defines
00049 #define mrlogmessage(logflag, ...) 
00050 /* #define mrKernDebug(flag, ...) */
00051 /* #define mrKernInfo(flag, ...) */
00052 /* #define mrKernWarning(flag, ...) */
00053 /* #define mrKernError(flag, ...) */
00054 #else //NODEBUG
00055 // defines for the messages
00056 // couldnt get variable arguments working
00057 /* #define mrKernDebug(flag, ...)   mrlogmessage(__FILE__, flag|LOG_DBG, __VA_ARGs__) */
00058 /* #define mrKernInfo(flag, ...)    mrlogmessage(__FILE__, flag|LOG_INFO, __VA_ARGs__) */
00059 /* #define mrKernWarning(flag, ...) mrlogmessage(__FILE__, flag|LOG_WARNING, __VA_ARGs__) */
00060 /* #define mrKernError(flag, ...)   mrlogmessage(__FILE__, flag|LOG_ERROR, __VA_ARGs__) */
00061 
00062 // the messages itself
00063 int mrlogmessage(u16 logflag, const char *fmt, ...);
00064 int mrLogMessage(const char* origin, u16 logflag, const char *fmt, ...);
00065 #endif // NODEBUG
00066 
00067 /* add a logging prefix
00068  * for now just a global variable will be set, for later extension, a list will be
00069  * created
00070  * for a stand-alone driver, this logging prefix is taken for all log messages
00071  * for the composite rcubus driver the logging prefix will be derived from the origin
00072  */
00073 void mrAddLogPrefix(const char* logprefix, const char* origin);
00074 
00075 #endif //__MR_KERN_LOGGING_H
